DoorcodeInfoTitle: Your door code is your key in Omena
DoorcodeInfoDesc: All guests will receive their door code by SMS and email close to the date of arrival.
NoTVNotice: TV in the room is being serviced and has been removed. You can now stay cheaper in a tv-less room.
WindowlessNotice: Restricted view from the room window. Stay cheaper in a room with no view out.
GiftCardTextDesc: but Omena's giftcard is the next best thing!
GiftCardDesc: Gift yourself or your loved ones a gift that you can all enjoy! The gift of time together

breakfast.HKI2: Bär Bar serves breakfast to Omena guests at Fredrikinkatu 30.
breakfast.HKI3: At Helsinki Yrjönkatu our breakfast partner is Picnic Kukontori, in shopping mall Forum at Mannerheimintie 20, 3rd floor.
breakfast.JYL1: In Jyväskylä Omena our breakfast partner is <2>Picnic Matkakeskus, at address Hannikaisenkatu 20.</2><1/>Mon-Fri 7:00-10:00 am<1/>Sat-Sun 9:00-11:00 am.
breakfast.POR2: Coffee House serves breakfast to Omena guests at Liisankatu 2-4.
breakfast.TKU1: Café Bär Bar serves breakfast to Omena Turku Humalistonkatu guests at Kristiinankatu 10.
breakfast.TKU2: At Omena Turku Kauppiaskatu our breakfast partner is <2>Espresso House</2> at <2>Eerikinkatu 10</2>.<1/>Mon-Fri 7 - 12<1/>Sat 8 - 12<1/>Sun 9 - 12
breakfast.TRE2: Café Siilinkari serves breakfast to Omena guests at Hämeenkatu 9.
breakfast.VSA2: In Vaasa our breakfast partner is Café Espen in same shopping center than the hotel.  You get there easily from the inside through shopping center Espen, or from outside on the marketplace side (address Alatori 1B)
